critique: The document is a formal executive order addressing actions and policies of UNITA. It conveys a sense of seriousness and determination to address a national emergency. There is no explicit expression of joy, but there is a sense of resolve. There is no explicit sadness, but there is a sense of concern. There is no explicit anger, but there is a sense of disapproval. There is no explicit fear, but there is a sense of caution. There is no explicit disgust, but there is a sense of aversion. There is no explicit surprise, but there is a sense of urgency.
